Title:
Spokane's Great Restaurant, Washington
Creator:
Mitchell, Edward H.
Date Created:
1909
Description:
Example postcard using display template 'multiple.' Postcard is of the Davenport Hotel's Restaurant in Spokane, Washington.
Subjects:
restaurants automobiles buildings picture postcards flagpoles flags
Location:
Spokane, WA
Latitude:
